Telephone Facility
IIT Jodhpur provides IP telephone to all Faculty, Group A officers, departments and various offices. Address
Digital Infrastructure & AutomationComputer Center,Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur,NH 62 Nagaur Road, Karwar 342030,Jodhpur District
Contact Us
Email: office_dia[at]iitj[dot]ac[dot]in
Communication: 0291-280-1180
Copyright© IIT Jodhpur




Register
Login

Users may contact by dialing 0291 280 xxxx where “xxxx” is intercom number of concern section. Drive Link
Phone Directory

The dialing procedure for accessing Intercom, local, STD & ISD facilities from your extension phone is as follows:
Within the campus dial four digit intercom number.
Institute telephone directory can be find through following link.
Call on Mobile: Dial 90 before 10 digit mobile number.

Local call in Jodhpur on landline: dial 9 and seven digits of landline number without area code. Call anywhere in Rajasthan/India on landline : Dial 90 and STD code before landline number. Call outside of India: Dial 00 before the destination number.
